title: Real-time Collaboration System
description: Implement a real-time collaboration system that enables multiple users to work simultaneously on shared documents and tasks with live updates, conflict resolution, and presence indicators.
iWant: to collaborate with teammates in real-time on shared documents and tasks
soThat: we can work efficiently together without version conflicts or communication delays
acceptanceCriteria: Multiple users can edit the same document simultaneously with changes visible within 500ms
Live cursor tracking shows each user's position with distinct visual indicators
Automatic conflict resolution using operational transforms prevents data loss
Connection status and presence indicators show who is online and active
Offline changes sync automatically when users reconnect
